title: Stream: AlunaGeorge – Body Music
content:
Showcasing their debut LP with a first of its kind blog-orientated promotional campaign (more info here), British dance duo AlunaGeorge have made Body Music available for online streaming, ahead of its release next week. Having featured on Disclosure’s smash hit White Noise, the London two, piece who came second in BBC’s Sound of 2013, are set to follow in the footsteps of their previous collaborators. With a series of hyped shows at festivals over this summer, including playing to a packed tent at Glastonbury, Body Music is a record packed full of potential singles. Featuring the previously heard You Know You Like It, Attracting Flies and Your Drums, Your Love, you can expect Body Music to be one of the most played records of the summer.

Body Music is released next week on Vagrant.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
